passives.name: Saint Cloth Extension
passives.desc:
When using Saint Cloth:
â€¢ Slight BRV increase based on MAX BRV
â€¢ Slight DEF Up boost

HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (magic  PG attack +  PF attack) when party has 6 or more buffs

HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (additionally grants BRV to allies based on HP damage dealt) when party has 9 or more buffs
passives.short_desc: Saint Cloth Extension: Boost to Saint Cloth

passives.name: Noble Loyalty Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV while Noble Loyalty active
passives.short_desc: Noble Loyalty Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Thunder Slash Extension
passives.desc:
When using Thunder Slash:
â€¢ Becomes 2-hit  PG attack with moderately increased cumulative damage

When using Thunder Slash+:
â€¢ Becomes 6-hit  PG attack with moderately increased cumulative damage
â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (2-hit magic  PG attack; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage) when party has 6 or more buffs

BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (2-hit magic  PG attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage) when party has 9 or more buffs
passives.short_desc: Thunder Slash Extension: Boost to Thunder Slash
